thread.title: The Smith Report: Potential impacts of China's economic slow down

title: The Smith Report: Potential impacts of China's economic slow down
text:
11 Sep 2015 | By Erin Smith 
As the Chinese economy slows down people are bracing for a global slump, but what are the potential impacts if any to the global wine and spirits trade? Available to subscribers only
